comment: The material gets very confusing at times and the application is the hardests.  Tests come out of the book - not the notes.  Students teach most of the class which can be a little confusing at times.  Overall, she does give plenty of chances for extra credit and seems to understand the restraints of students working full-time and going to school.
She is an awesome professor.  She is very personal and a great teacher.  If you attend class and pay attention, you will get a great grade.
This class was very straight to the point and tested my ability to speak in front of crowds. She was very fair on grading and is easy if you at least try.
